original_text: Peter said to him, “Lord, I am ready to go with you both to prison and to death.”
korean_text: 그가 말하되 주여 내가 주와 함께 옥에도, 죽는 데에도 가기를 각오하였나이다

sentences.original_text: I am ready to go with you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신과 함께 갈 준비가 되어 있습니다

sentences.original_text: both to prison and to death.”
